title: Reader?
content: I'm looking for a sans family that was released in the last year that is something like an Akzidenz Grotesk with blunt/round corners. I thought it was called "Reader" but googling that has failed me.
author: Stephen Coles

comments.content:
[http://www.colophon-foundry.org/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100209075243/http:/www.colophon-foundry.org/ "http://www.colophon-foundry.org/")  
No deep-linking it seems.

Oh, and it _is_ called Reader, but only the Black looks to have rounded corners.  
Is this what you were looking for?
Is it just me or is their Proofer thingy not working at all? Just shows yellow striped background and that's it.
Seems to work fine in IE8
@xo: I suppose you too would use IE if you work at Microsoft.
(edit) - Nevermind. It just doesn't seem to work in Firefox. Works in IE6 though.

<cite>It just doesn't seem to work in Firefox</cite>

Strange. It works just fine in Camino.
